includedAssets.title: Thirsty Bird
includedAssets.synopsis: Piper finds herself in unfamiliar surroundings and is unsure of her future following her brawl with Pennsatucky.

includedAssets.title: A Whole Other Hole
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep4 - A Whole Other Hole
includedAssets.synopsis: Lorna takes drastic action when she learns that Christopher is marrying another woman, while Nicky and Boo compete to see who can rack up the most notches on their bedpost.

includedAssets.title: Low Self Esteem City
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep5 - Low Self Esteem City

includedAssets.title: 40 Oz. Of Furlough

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: In season two of the hit comedy drama, an old enemy of one of the inmates arrives at Litchfield, leading to a dangerous divide between the prisoners. Meanwhile, Piper deals with the fallout from her fight.

includedIn.title: Orange is the New Black
includedIn.synopsis: When privileged New Yorker Piper Chapman is collared for a crime she committed 10 years earlier, she is sentenced to 15 months in prison, where she's forced to get used to a whole new way of life.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A privileged New Yorker is collared for a crime she committed 10 years earlier and sentenced to 15 months in prison.
